name: NPR
text:
Roberta McCain, the mother of the late Sen. John McCain, who was instrumental in fostering the character that her son displayed during his life of service, has died at the age of 108.

text:
The NBA reported no coronavirus cases inside its bubble that began in July. The Lakers' championship victory over the Miami Heat marked the end of the socially distanced season.
